body:
Hey Guys!, Running_Boy_12 here! Today I have finished my first adventure map! It is called the Elder Wither Boss Fight! Basically, it is a special boss fight! (In Vanilla) The Elder Wither is not just an ordinary wither! It has a couple special attacks and particles and such. I hope you enjoy it!

[NOTICE] This map uses 249 command blocks!

Download:
https://sites.google.com/site/runningboy12sdownloads/maps Elder Wither Boss Fight(1F) is what the file is called.

***Special Thanks:***
-Random_Guy for Testing
-Thrasilias for Testing
-resepignev for Testing

title: MY FIRST ADVENTURE MAP!

replies.body:
Niiiiiiiice

You have great power with command blocks, and adventure maps are awesome. Nice work man!

It was fun to test, good work bruthuh :)
